name: Thick Fog Bank
description: A supernatural fog rolls through the area, reducing visibility to a few feet and deadening all sounds. The fog seems to move with purpose, separating party members.
effect: Heavy obscurement (effectively blinded beyond 5 feet), disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on hearing, party members easily become separated
avoidMethod: Rope or chain linking party members, Navigation skill checks, magic to disperse fog temporarily, wait for fog to pass
